hanzi-su-wiki:
詳

Значения

Подробный, детальный, тщательный; подробный

Мнемоника

Скотовод узнаёт своих баранов 羊 даже по словесному 言 описанию, он в курсе мельчайших подробностей.

Варианты

详
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiáng
detailed; comprehensive
подробный; всесторонний
rtega_mnemonic:
詳詳RS
详详		detailed, complete, thorough
  • a farmer speaking 言 about his sheep 羊: he knows all the details thoroughly
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 详)
Antonyms: 略
Pictophonetic: 羊 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
詳細 [ xiáng xì ]: detailed; in detail; minute
詳盡 [ xiáng jìn ]: thorough and detailed; exhaustive; the tedious details in full
詳實 [ xiáng shí ]: detailed and reliable; full and accurate
詳情 [ xiáng qíng ]: details; particulars
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 羊 [ yáng ] sheep, goat
heisig_chinese_memo: Trembling from head to hoof from such a traumatic experience, the sheep gives a very detailed and wordy account to the detective about his wolf attack. "We need more details Mr. Sheep. Tell us exactly where the baaad man touched you".
heisig_constituent: detailed, say, words, keitai, mouth, sheep
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: подробно, полная, минута, точный, хорошо информированные
koohiiStory1: Trembling from head to hoof from such a traumatic experience, the sheep gives a very detailed worded account to the detective about his wolf attack. "We need more details Mr. Sheep. Tell us exactly where the baaad man touched you".
koohiiStory2: Say! detailed sheep, not like that! DE-TAILED sheep. Got it?
jp_example_words:
詳細(しょうさい): detail, particulars
詳しい(くわしい): knowing very well, detailed, full, accurate
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: They say sheep are detailed creatures. I mean, I never thought sheep were very detailed, but that’s what they say.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine getting really close to a sheep and seeing all the tiny detailed curls in their wool. There are hidden patterns you'd never noticed before now!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The reason these sheep are so detailed is that they are trying to impress the Shougun (しょう). If they're fancy enough, perhaps the Shougun won’t kill them for their meat and make their wool into clothing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the Shougun, leaning in close to inspect the detailed patterns all over the sheep. His nose is so close, he can probably smell all the little detailed nuances of the sheep's musk too.
Ru_Radicals: 并, 王 (монарх), 羊 (овца), 言 (слово)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sheep's (羊) words (言) are detailed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It might not seem like it but all those "baaaaaa!"s are actually detailed words between the sheep.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " sheep " sound. The original meaning is to examine thoroughly and carefully. "Said Wen": "Detailed, deliberation. Cong Yan, Yang Sheng." Such as "Shang Shu. "Cai Zhongzhi's Life": "Details are audio-visual. If you don't use side words to change Juedu, you will be given to one person Rujia." Kong Chuan: "Examine your audio-visual carefully, and don't see if it is impertinent." Uncle He Ping "Jing Fu Palace Fu": "Examine the daily power and detail the expenses."

" Detailed " means weekly and detailed. Such as "Mencius. Li Lou Xia": "Well-learned and detailed, I will say about it in reverse." "Xunzi. "Feixiang": "The biography is for a long time to discuss briefly, the nearer is to discuss in detail, the slightly to give a large, and the detailed to give a small."

" Detailed " means detailed description. Such as "Poetry. The wind. "Wall You Ci": "Zhong冓's words, can't be detailed." Zhu Xi's collection: "Detailed, detailed words." "Zhong冓" refers to the inner room, and "not detailed" means that you cannot elaborate one by one. Another example is "Lun Heng. "Unknown Articles": "Wang Mang has no way, the Han army rises, the Taige is abandoned, and the documents are abandoned. Guangwu is revived, and the repair and preservation are unclear."

" Detailed " means to know in detail. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "The Biography of Lu Xun": "The minister is afraid that there will be unexplained things, such as the resumption of slaying, which will lose people's hope." Eastern Jin Tao Yuanming's "Mr. Wuliu Biography": "Mr.

" Detailed " means prudence. Such as "Hou Han Shu. The Biography of Wang Liu Zhang Li Peng Lu: "To build his son today, he will be suspicious of the people. Moreover, there are many deceitful people, so it is appropriate to be detailed." Wei Shu. "He Chang Yang Du Zhao Pei Biography": "And the distance is many, it must be unknown."

" Detailed " means calm, steady and peaceful. For example, Song Yu of the Warring States Period "Goddess Fu": "Tan is quiet and stunned, and his sex is calm and not annoying." Zhao Shenzhu of the Tang Dynasty "The epitaph of Zhaofujun, a former resident of the Tang Dynasty": "Meng Nan was weak in the autumn of the crown Old man, serene and graceful, and firm in the style of the country."

" Details " pass " paradox " that means pretending. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. "Tianwen": "Uncle Mei is tainted, and Jizi is mad." Yinqueshan Han Bamboo Slips "Sun Tzu Art of War." "Junzheng" Jian 81: "Be (back) do not welcome Qiu, detailed (pretend) North do not follow." Today's "Sun Tzu" as " fee ".

" Detailed " also means reporting. For example, Qi Jiguang of the Ming Dynasty "Practice of Military Training. Miscellaneous Three: "Those who should be on their own, don't dare to be late, if you should ask for details, please follow them in detail." Qing Dynasty Wu Jingzi's "The Scholars of the Scholars" Chapter 34: "This matter, my brother had to prepare a document and reply in detail. See what the adults mean."
humanum_short_description_en: From " speak " to " sheep " sound. The original meaning is to examine thoroughly and carefully.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「羊」聲。本義是全面、仔細地審察。《說文》：「詳，審議也。从言，羊聲。」如《尚書．蔡仲之命》：「詳乃視聽，罔以側言改厥度，則予一人汝嘉。」孔傳：「詳審汝視聽，非禮義勿視聽。」《文選．何平叔〈景福殿賦〉》：「審量日力，詳度費務。」

　　「詳」表示周遍、詳細。如《孟子．離婁下》：「博學而詳說之，將以反說約也。」《荀子．非相》：「傳者久則論略，近則論詳，略則舉大，詳則舉小。」

　　「詳」表示詳細說明。如《詩．鄘風．墻有茨》：「中冓之言，不可詳也。」朱熹集傳：「詳，詳言之也。」「中冓」指內室，「不可詳」意謂不能一一細說。又如《論衡．佚文》：「王莽無道，漢軍雲起，臺閣廢頓，文書棄散。光武中興，修存未詳。」

　　「詳」表示詳細知道。如《三國志．吳書．陸遜傳》：「臣懼有司未詳其事，如復誅戮，益失民望。」東晉陶淵明〈五柳先生傳〉：「先生不知何許人也，亦不詳其姓字。」

　　「詳」表示審慎。如《後漢書．王劉張李彭盧列傳》：「今尊立其子，將疑眾心。且齊人多詐，宜且詳之。」《三國志．魏書．和常楊杜趙裴傳》：「且遠近多虞，不可不詳也。」

　　「詳」表示從容穩重、安詳。如戰國宋玉〈神女賦〉：「澹清靜其愔嫕兮，性沈詳而不煩。」唐代趙申昈〈唐故居士天水趙府君墓誌銘〉：「孟男年居弱冠之秋，居然老成，安詳大雅，合國風之堅操。」

　　「詳」通「佯」，表示假裝。如《楚辭．天問》：「梅伯受醢，箕子詳狂。」銀雀山漢簡《孫子兵法．軍爭》簡81：「倍（背）丘勿迎，詳（佯）北勿從。」今本《孫子》作「佯」。

　　「詳」還表示上報。如明代戚繼光《練兵實紀．雜集三》：「應該自行者，不敢遲怠，應該請詳者，請詳遵奉。」清代吳敬梓《儒林外史》第34回：「這事，弟也只得備文書詳覆上去，看大人意思何如。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「羊」聲。本義是全面、仔細地審察。

xiang2
HSK 4: 降,详,詳
HSK 6: 祥,翔
詳詳RS
详详 		detailed, complete, thorough
  • a farmer speaking 言 about his sheep 羊: he knows all the details thoroughly
(Simplified: 详)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 略
Pictophonetic: 羊 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 羊 [ yáng ] sheep, goat
①細密，完備，與“略”相對：詳細。詳略。詳情。詳談。周詳。詳實(詳細而確實。亦作“翔實”)。語焉不詳(說得不詳細)。
②清楚地知道：內容不詳。
③說明，細說：內詳。
④審慎：詳平(審理案件審慎公平)。詳刑(斷案用刑謹慎)。
⑤舊時的一種公文，下級官員對上級的報告：上詳。詳文。
⑥略。

詳盡 [ xiáng jìn ]: thorough and detailed; exhaustive; the tedious details in full
詳實 [ xiáng shí ]: detailed and reliable; full and accurate
詳情 [ xiáng qíng ]: details; particulars

從「 言 」，「 羊 」聲。本義是全面、仔細地審察。《說文》：「詳，審議也。从言，羊聲。」如《尚書．蔡仲之命》：「詳乃視聽，罔以側言改厥度，則予一人汝嘉。」孔傳：「詳審汝視聽，非禮義勿視聽。」《文選．何平叔〈景福殿賦〉》：「審量日力，詳度費務。」 「 詳 」表示周遍、詳細。如《孟子．離婁下》：「博學而詳說之，將以反說約也。」《荀子．非相》：「傳者久則論略，近則論詳，略則舉大，詳則舉小。」 「 詳 」表示詳細說明。如《詩．鄘風．墻有茨》：「中冓之言，不可詳也。」朱熹集傳：「詳，詳言之也。」「中冓」指內室，「不可詳」意謂不能一一細說。又如《論衡．佚文》：「王莽無道，漢軍雲起，臺閣廢頓，文書棄散。光武中興，修存未詳。」 「 詳 」表示詳細知道。如《三國志．吳書．陸遜傳》：「臣懼有司未詳其事，如復誅戮，益失民望。」東晉陶淵明〈五柳先生傳〉：「先生不知何許人也，亦不詳其姓字。」 「 詳 」表示審慎。如《後漢書．王劉張李彭盧列傳》：「今尊立其子，將疑眾心。且齊人多詐，宜且詳之。」《三國志．魏書．和常楊杜趙裴傳》：「且遠近多虞，不可不詳也。」 「 詳 」表示從容穩重、安詳。如戰國宋玉〈神女賦〉：「澹清靜其愔嫕兮，性沈詳而不煩。」唐代趙申昈〈唐故居士天水趙府君墓誌銘〉：「孟男年居弱冠之秋，居然老成，安詳大雅，合國風之堅操。」 「 詳 」通「 佯 」，表示假裝。如《楚辭．天問》：「梅伯受醢，箕子詳狂。」銀雀山漢簡《孫子兵法．軍爭》簡81：「倍（背）丘勿迎，詳（佯）北勿從。」今本《孫子》作「 佯 」。 「 詳 」還表示上報。如明代戚繼光《練兵實紀．雜集三》：「應該自行者，不敢遲怠，應該請詳者，請詳遵奉。」清代吳敬梓《儒林外史》第34回：「這事，弟也只得備文書詳覆上去，看大人意思何如。」

詳字的基本解释

詳
xiáng

詳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiáng］
［《廣韻》似羊切，平陽，邪。］
“详1”的繁体字。
(1)审慎。
(2)审察；审理。
(3)揣摩；推断。
(4)繁多；周详。
(5)细说；细述。
(6)了解；知悉。
(7)详情；细节。
(8)祷祝。参见“詳星拜斗”。
(9)平正；公平。
(10)旧时下级官员对上级官员请示报告曰“詳”。
(11)指此类上报的文书。
(12)通“祥”。吉祥。
(13)通“祥”。和顺。
(14)通“祥”。善。
(15)通“祥”。完美。
(16)通“翔”。
[②]［yáng］
［《廣韻》與章切，平陽，以。］
“详2”的繁体字。通“佯1”。
诈，假装。

詳字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詳； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1158第17
【唐韻】似羊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徐羊切，?音翔。【說文】審議也。【玉篇】審也，論也，諟也。【增韻】語備也。【書·蔡仲之命】詳乃視聽。【傳】審也。【詩·衞風】中冓之言，不可詳也。【傳】詳言之也。【穀梁傳·襄二十九年】詳其事，賢伯姬也。【史記·封禪書】其詳不可得而記聞。【前漢·儒林傳】詳延天下方聞之士。【註】詳，悉也。　又善也。【易·大壯】不能退，不能遂，不詳也。【疏】詳者，善也。進退不定，非爲善也。【釋文】王肅作祥。【左傳·成十六年】詳以事神。【註】詳，祥也。　又善用心曰詳。【公羊傳·宣十二年】不赦不詳。　又官名。【宋史·職官志】檢詳官，熙寧四年置。又【金史·百官志】鎭撫邊民之官曰詳穩，踵遼官名也。　又通作翔。【前漢·西域傳】道里遠近翔實矣。【師古註】翔，與詳同。假借用耳。　又【廣韻】與章切【集韻】余章切【正韻】移章切，?音陽。詐也。通作佯。【史記·殷本紀】箕子詳狂爲奴。　【說文】本作?。【字彙】譌作詳，列六畫。非。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiáng］
["Guangyun" is like a sheep cut, Pingyang, evil. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "detail 1".
(1) Prudence.
(2) Inspection; trial.
(3) Try to figure out; infer.
(4) Many; comprehensive.
(5) Elaborate; elaborate.
(6) To understand; to know.
(7) Details; details.
(8) Prayer wishes. See "Worshiping the Stars in Detail".
(9) Fairness; fairness.
(10) In the old days, the lower-level officials asked the higher-level officials to report "detailed."
(11) Refers to such reporting documents.
(12) Tong "xiang". auspicious.
(13) Tong "xiang". Heshun.
(14) Tong "xiang". good.
(15) Tong "xiang". perfect.
(16) Through "xiang".
[②]［yáng］
["Guangyun" and chapter cut, Pingyang, to. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "detail 2". Same as "False 1".
Fraud, pretend.

detailed
Name meaning
Nothing.
xiáng, yáng
вм. 详
Radicals: 言, 羊  (say, sheep)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say sheep are detailed creatures. I mean, I never thought sheep were very detailed, but that’s what they say.
Imagine getting really close to a sheep and seeing all the tiny detailed curls in their wool. There are hidden patterns you'd never noticed before now!
Reading Mnemonic
The reason these sheep are so detailed is that they are trying to impress the Shougun (しょう). If they're fancy enough, perhaps the Shougun won’t kill them for their meat and make their wool into clothing.
Picture the Shougun, leaning in close to inspect the detailed patterns all over the sheep. His nose is so close, he can probably smell all the little detailed nuances of the sheep's musk too.
